div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1614 Samaria-Sebaste, Samaria, 1910 (901) Burial: after 74 B.C. (Kadman) Contents: 1 AR, 22 AE. From excavations Antiochus VII: 1 tetradr. (Tyre) Tyre: 22 AE (latest legible date 75/4 B.C.) Disposition: unknown Harvard Excavations at Samaria I (Cambridge, Mass., 1924), pp. 52, 253, 261, 264 Kadman, INCJ, hd. 11
